home.info_1: Gakugyō no katei de, Sofutowea kanren no bun'ya ni tokubetsu na kyōmi o mochimashita. CFE (seifu kikan) de no senmon no intānshippu de wa, Dēta Bunseki no tame no Web apurikēshon o kaihatsu shimashita. Nochi ni, senmon ronbun no ichi'kan to shite, iryō kurinikku muke no Web apurikēshon o kōchiku shimashita.
home.info_2: Puroguramingu e no jōnetsu to kono ryōiki de no kyaria o tsuiseki suru fukutsu no doryoku ni yotte, watashi wa ima ya Sofutowea enjinia to shite 2-nen ijō no keiken o atsumemashita.
home.goodbye: Otoiawase ga aru baai wa okigaru ni go renraku kudasai.

projects.aclaration: Hikai hoketsu no tame, Infosys de okonatta purojekuto no kōdo o hyōji shitari, toriatsukatta kuraianto ni tsuite hanashitari suru koto wa dekimasen. Kōko no jōhō wa, watashi no sukiru o shimesu kojin purojekuto ni kansuru mono desu.

CFE.content: Watashi wa, tsukijigatsu de EPHP de Web apurikēshon o kaihatsu shimashita. Isan keiyaku bu no shiryō wa, hotondo 4000-rekōdo no dokyumento o 1-shūkan ijō kakete, tezukuri de bunseki shite imashita. Watashi no soryūshon no okage de, sono tāsuku wa 10-fun ijō ni shōshō saremashita.

INFOSYS.content: Infosys wa kokusai-tekina IT konsarutingu kaishadesu. Watashi wa, sukuramu shuhō nimotozuite, sekaijū ni bunsan shita chīmu to eigo de bijinesu kankyō ni tazusawaru koto ni narimashita.
bullets: Java - Spring Boot o shiyō shita bakkuendo kaihatsu ni kōken shimashita
Typescript - AngularJS o shiyō shita furontoendo kaihatsu ni kōken shimashita
Dētabēsu sekkei (MySQL) ni sanka shi, metadēta katarogu o tantō shimashita
JUnit oyobi Mockito o shiyō shita tesuto doraibun kaihatsu o jisshō shimashita

Sābā to dētabēsu no ikan, ikaihen purojekuto ni kankaishimashita. Python, Airflow, Kafka, Spark o shiyō shita ETL pairain o jissō shimashita. Mata, Amazon Web Services (CloudWatch to Lambda) ni kankaishimashita.

resume.title: ReactJS de Tsukurareta Onrain Rirekisho
resume.content: Kono Webu Saito wa, watashi no sukiru o shōmei shi, hoka no purojekuto o shōkai suru tame ni kaihatsu sare mashita.

cfe.title: Dēta Bunseki Webu Apurikēshon
cfe.source: Senmon Intānshippu no ichi'kan toshite no purojekuto
cfe.content: Watashi wa, isan keiyaku bu ga tsukijigatsu no dēta bunseki o jidōka suru tame ni PHP de Web apurikēshon o kaihatsu shimashita. Yūzā no yōkyū ni ōjite jōhō o furutāringu shi, csv/xlsx fairu o yomi komi, shikendekitara sakusei suru MVC kōzō no apurikēshon desu. Adominisutorētā, yūzā, pasuwādo kontorōru, Būtsutorappu de tsukurareta shiyōyasui intāfeisu ga fukumarete imasu.

lishor.to: Rinku Tanshuku ga hitsuyō na kata muke
lishor.title: Rinku Tanshuku Sābisu
lishor.content: Watashi wa, Rinku no tanshuku o okonau tame ni ExpressJS + Typescript de Web apurikēshon o kaihatsu shimashita. Dokkāka sarete orimasu. Watashi no kojinteki na mokuteki wa, Infosys de shūtoku shita subete no purofesshonarudeberomento no kontseputo (TDD, Reiyādo ākitekucha, Oubujekuto-shi, Dēta Toraansufā Obujekuto, Erā Handaringu, nado) o tekiyō suru koto deshita.

davel.title: Sakka-yō no Wordpress Burogu
davel.content: Watashi wa, Sakka no tameno Wordpress tēma o kaihatsu shimashita. Kasutamu sutairu to senmon no sōkō no sakusei (Hon) ga tokuchō desu. Webu saito o hōmon shite saishū sagyō o goran kudasai.

letras.title: Tekisuto Shori Webu Apurikēshon
letras.content: Watashi wa, sakka o taishō to shita Webu apurikēshon o kaihatsu shimashita. Sono mokuteki wa, yūzāfurīndorī intāfeisu de tekisuto o kōkei shi, keisan suru koto desu. Webu saito o hōmon shite saishū sagyō o goran kudasai.
